name: Flower Shop
description: A small local flower shop in Cassandra that normally serves as a quiet, ordinary business, but may become the final resting place of a tragic victim if events take a darker turn.

snapshot.name: Flower Shop
snapshot.location: A neighborhood flower shop in Cassandra
snapshot.description: The flower shop is usually filled with fresh flowers and the scent of plants. Under normal circumstances it is peaceful and unremarkable. However, under certain outcomes of the investigation, it becomes a grim discovery site where a body is found among the flowers, sharply contrasting with the shop’s intended atmosphere of beauty and life.

characters.name: Nancy
characters.notes: If the surgical intervention fails or is not performed, Nancy’s corpse will appear here.

clues.clueText: Nancy’s body is discovered inside the flower shop.
clues.location: Among the flower displays inside the shop
reveals: Failure to save Nancy from the spider infection
The tragic consequence of earlier investigative choices

conditions.description: A strong floral scent mixed with the unsettling odor of death
Soft indoor lighting typical of a small retail shop

events: Discovery of Nancy’s corpse if the operation fails
Simon collapses emotionally and disappears following the discovery

exits.description: The main glass door leading out to the street

snapshot.keeperNotes: The flower shop is a conditional scene that only becomes relevant if Nancy dies. Use the contrast between flowers and death to heighten horror. This scene marks a major emotional and narrative turning point, especially for Simon.

connections.description: Nancy’s spider bite near the winery and the failed attempt to save her lead to this outcome
